A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was VERY impressed with this movie.  It was\, by far\, the best acted Star Wars movie since ESB in 1980.  The plot and character choices were risky\, which is why I think some others didn't like it.  But they were mature\, stand up well upon review (I've seen it twice now)\, and kept the audience guessing.  I watched dozens of fan theories online before I went and had a few of my own\, and I was very please that R. Johnson managed to both fool us all as well as make it entertaining.  Go see it.  It's immensely entertaining\, very funny at times\, and has a couple of good morals to its story.
